data.text:
24/7/365 Online Support

Are you are starting your first website, Need Help! our professional staff is here to assist you every step of the way. We are here 24/7/365 to assist you with any aspect of your web host and web design experience. Allow us the opportunity to exceed your expectations.

30 Day Money Back Guarantee

We are so confident about our service that we back it with our 30-day unconditional money-back guarantee. If our services do not exceed your expectations, we will refund your money back. Refunds are handled within 24-48 hours of receipt of cancellation.

99.9% Uptime Servers

Sleep peacefully knowing that your server is backed by our 99.9% uptime guarantee. All our VPS are setup in a fully redundant infrastructure with 100% power availability SLA, and 100% cooling availability SLA

Kabul Designs is the leading Web Hosting, Web Designing, Web Development, Domain Registrar, Graphic and Logo Design Company in Afghanistan.

Kabul Designs assists businesses, individuals and non-profits organizations so that they can best leverage the unique reach of their websites to increase their sales, profits and to be introduced through the globe with its cheap web designing and web hosting services.
